name: Oliver's Terrain Game
description:
Story: You are sent on a secret mission to an island occupied by the rouge country Nondescripistan to stop their evil plans. Battle your way through their nondescript troops, kill their mutant leader, then get off the island. 

WASD to move

Space to Jump

Scroll mouse to switch weapons

-I made some of the assets (characters & animations, crates, pillars, etc) but most of it is from the asset store
